downloadTitle: MVP Session 12: Design and use custom shapes and stencils in Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Watch a brief demonstration on how to create a master shape in Visio 2010 and save it to a stencil for reuse in other drawings.
detailsSection:
Learn about designing and using custom shapes and stencils in Microsoft Visio 2010. This video reviews how you can customize a shape to meet your needs and then save it as a master shape on a new stencil, making it easy to use in other drawings. It covers how you can save custom stencils in the My Shapes folder in your user folder and then access them from More Shapes in the Shapes panel. 
This video is part of a series covering the basics of how to use Visio features and capabilities. Visit http://visio.microsoft/MVPSessions to learn more and view other videos in this series.
installInstructionSection: The video has two downloadable resolution: 1000k/lowest and 8000k/highest. Click Download to save the video to your computer.
